data.name: AVRToDataTable
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME) db.Open()
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
{parms} {options} dt = Query.Exec() *As DataTable // DataTable now available for databinding or other use. Generally you'll assign this // DataTable to a grid or some other control's DataSource property. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf db.Close()

data.name: AVRToExcelWeb
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress") DclConst EXCEL_FILE Value("C:\spreadsheets\customers.xlsx")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclFld ExcelAdapter Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToExcelAdapter) DclFLd Excel Type(ASNA.Helpers.ASPNET.ExcelExport) New() DclFld Result Type(*Boolean)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME) db.Open()
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
ExcelAdapter = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToExcelAdapter(Query.Args) Query.OverrideAdapter(ExcelAdapter) Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("heading","Customer Listing") Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("worksheet_name","Customers")
{parms} {options} Result = Excel.CreateSpreadsheet(HttpContext.Current,Inputs) If (Result) // Spreadsheet creation was successful. Else // Spreadsheet creation failed. EndIf

data.name: AVRToExcelWindows
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress") DclConst EXCEL_FILE Value("C:\spreadsheets\customers.xlsx")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclFld ExcelAdapter Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToExcelAdapter)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME) db.Open()
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
ExcelAdapter = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToExcelAdapter(Query.Args) Query.OverrideAdapter(ExcelAdapter) Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("heading","Customer Listing") Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("worksheet_name","Customers")
{parms} {options} Query.Exec() // Excel spreadsheet is now available in the Query object. In a Windows app // you'll probably use the ToExcelAdapter's SaveToLocalFile() method to save // save the spreadsheeet. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf ExcelAdapter.SaveToLocalFile(EXCEL_FILE) db.Close()

data.name: AVRToJson
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclFld Json Type(*String)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME) db.Open()
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
Query.OverrideAdapter(*New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToJsonAdapter(Query.Args))
{parms} {options} Json = Query.Exec() *As *String // The Json data is now available. Generally you'll emit this data in a Web // app for JavaScript use. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf db.Close()

data.name: AVRToListItemArray
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client Using System.Web
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclArray ListItems Type(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem) Rank(1)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME) db.Open()
// The ToListItemArrayAdapter requires that two fields in the FieldsList // be aliased 'text' and 'value.'
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}" Query.OverrideAdapter(*New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToLisItemArrayAdapter(Query.Args))
{parms} {options} ListItems = Query.Exec() *As System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem[] // The array of ListItems is now available. Generally you'll use a ComboBox // or DropDownList's AddRange() method to assign this array. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf db.Close()

data.name: CSToDataTable
CSToExcelWeb
CSToExcelWindows
CSToJson
CSToListItemArray
JSToDataTable
data.value: You can only generate Json with JavaScript. Click the "ToJson" tab to see an example.

data.name: JSToJson
